title: Is Web3 gaming doomed? Startling failure rates exposed in new report
description: The emerging Web3 gaming sector has faced significant challenges, as evidenced by a recent analysis from Coingecko. The report reveals a startlingly high failure rate of Web3 games launched between 2018 and 2023. Out of 2,817 games introduced in this period, 2,127 have either failed or become inactive, indicating a concerning trend in the nascent ... Read more
